thread.title: How Much Allowance Should You Give Your College Freshman?
thread.title_full: How Much Allowance Should You Give Your College Freshman?

title: How Much Allowance Should You Give Your College Freshman?
text:
How Much Allowance Should You Give Your College Freshman? Written by: Gina Ragusa 08/18/15 - 10:40 AM EDT 
NEW YORK (MainStreet) -- Do you know how much allowance to give your college freshman this fall? 
Knowing the “magic” amount is elusive to most, and the answer to this question is still staring many parents in the face on the eve of college drop-off this fall. 
“The problem is that every kid and school is different,” says Christine Caruso of Davie, Fla. Caitlin, Caruso’s 18-year-old daughter, is gearing up for her first year at Florida State University and has asked for additional funds to cover items like books, weekend movie money and sorority fees. “We are still trying to decide about the meal plan, but she will be living in the dorms and we aren’t exactly sure how much to give her,” Caruso continues. “The problem is that many of my friends, who are also sending their oldest off to college don’t know what to do either.” More Headlines
